amendment.description: Amendment requires a GAO report to be submitted to Congress on the potential of battery energy storage.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
